text: George Haigh (26 June 1915 â€“ 23 April 2019) was an English professional footballer. He is known for his association with Stockport County. At the age of 103, he was the oldest surviving former County player. He was said to be the oldest surviving former professional footballer, although Arthur Smith was one month older. ==References== Category:1915 births Category:2019 deaths Category:British military personnel of World War II Category:British centenarians Category:English footballers Category:English football managers
title: George Haigh
